name: Focalistic
description: '''Lethabo Sebetso''' (born 26 May 1996), professionally known as '''Focalistic''', is a South African rapper. He rose to prominence after his single "[[Ke Star]]", reached number 16 on [[Billboard (Magazine)|Billboard]] Top Triller Global charts. Born and raised in [[Pretoria]], Sebetso was a footballer  prior pursuing a music career as a rapper, released his debut studio album  ''Sgubhu Ses Excellent'' (2020).
